featured.text: In English-speaking cultures, the choice of first names for children can be prompted by many factors: tradition, religion, nature, culture, and fashion, to name just a few.

other.text: All the time that we spend rooted in the chair is linked to increased risks of so many deadly diseases that experts have named this modern-day health epidemic the “sitting disease.”

definition.zh_def: 名稱；一個人或事物的識別標籤。
definition.en_def: A word or set of words by which a person or thing is known, addressed, or referred to.
